name: The Pipe
description:
You find yourself in a strange forest with nothing but your flashlight and a task to find out more about the Pipe.

-

Alpha version of the game, it has been a learning experiance sofar.

Probably wont work on this for a while, as i no longer have enough time to ^^

As for now the game's end goal has not ben implemented so enjoy the atmosphere and explore the Pipe.
